Actuarial Statistics (Priyam’s Fork) Priyam 02 August, 2025 Introduction As an adapted version, there may be changes, bugs, typos, or errors. Please report any issues you find here. Motivation The purpose of this book is to build upon the original work for studying Actuarial Statistics (CS1) from the Institute and Faculty of Actuaries by providing updated R code examples across the following topic areas: Random variables and distributions Data analysis Statistical inference Regression theory and applications Bayesian statistics
